casebody.data:
Edgar Ralph CRABTREE v. C. H. LOONEY, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Leavenworth, Kansas. No. 5763. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Jan. 7, 1958. William C. Farmer, U. S. Atty., and E. Edward Johnson, Asst. U. S. Atty., Topeka, Kan., for appellee.

Before BRATTON, Chief Judge, PICKETT, Circuit Judge, and RICE, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed without written opinion.
